game.title: The Lost Temple of Eldarath
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient scroll from the Lost Temple of Eldarath.
game.description: Rumors have been circulating about a long-abandoned temple deep in the heart of the mystical forest, where an ancient scroll holds the secrets of the forgotten magic. The village elder has requested your assistance in retrieving this powerful artifact.
game.reward: 500 gold pieces and a magical amulet granting resistance to dark magic

task.objective: Gather information about the temple's location.
task.description: Speak with the local villagers and gather information about the temple's location. Be cautious, as some may be unwilling to share their knowledge.

task.objective: Navigate through the mystical forest to reach the temple.
task.description: Make your way through the treacherous paths and avoid the dangers that lurk within. Keep an eye out for ancient ruins and markings that may lead you to the temple.

task.objective: Infiltrate the temple and retrieve the ancient scroll.
task.description: Use your skills and cunning to bypass traps and defeat any guardians that may be protecting the scroll. Be warned, the temple's secrets are not to be taken lightly.
